description: Phillips head, #8, zinc-plated, 1 inch length, coarse thread
Flat washer, stainless steel grade 316, inner diameter 6mm, outer diameter 12mm, thickness 1.5mm, corrosion resistant, suitable for marine applications
Hex nut, M8 thread, carbon steel with zinc coating, meets DIN 934 specification, tensile strength grade 8, recommended torque 25 Nm, includes thread lock

Heavy-duty wall anchor system, designed for concrete and masonry, load capacity 50kg per anchor, includes: expansion sleeve, threaded rod, mounting plate, hex nuts, washers, installation template, detailed instructions with diagrams, safety warnings, torque specifications, and troubleshooting guide, meets building codes for seismic zones, certified by independent testing lab, warranty covers manufacturing defects for 10 years
Split pin, 3mm diameter, 25mm length, spring steel

L-shaped mounting bracket, powder-coated steel, dimensions: 100mm x 100mm x 50mm, thickness 2mm, pre-drilled holes 8mm diameter, load capacity 30kg when properly mounted, includes mounting hardware kit, suitable for indoor and outdoor use, rust-resistant coating
